revised_title: Investigating the Decomposition and Oxidation Effects of Alkaline Peroxides
tldr: The author investigates the decomposition and oxidation effects of alkaline peroxides, discovering that these reactions follow the normal law of chemical action and are subject to atomic ratios. The study also reveals that the supposed differences in oxygen properties among peroxides do not exist and that the effects of oxidation can be achieved by modifying the experiment's circumstances.
